mapper.sql: ID, PRICING_ENTRY_CODE, AMOUNT, WAYBILL_NO, PRICING_CRI_DETAIL_ID, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, ACTIVE, BILL_TIME, CURRENCY_CODE
ID, PRICING_ENTRY_CODE, AMOUNT/100 as AMOUNT, WAYBILL_NO, PRICING_CRI_DETAIL_ID, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, ACTIVE, BILL_TIME,CURRENCY_CODE
mapper.insert: insert into PKP.T_SRV_WAYBILL_CH_DETAIL_PG (ID, PRICING_ENTRY_CODE, AMOUNT, WAYBILL_NO, PRICING_CRI_DETAIL_ID, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, ACTIVE, BILL_TIME, CURRENCY_CODE) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pricingEntryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}*100, #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pricingCriDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{active,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{currencyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update PKP.T_SRV_WAYBILL_CH_DETAIL_PG
PRICING_ENTRY_CODE = #{pricingEntryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}*100,
WAYBILL_NO = #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRICING_CRI_DETAIL_ID = #{pricingCriDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ACTIVE = #{active,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BILL_TIME = #{billTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CURRENCY_CODE = #{currencyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update PKP.T_SRV_WAYBILL_CH_DETAIL_PG set PRICING_ENTRY_CODE = #{pricingEntryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}*100, WAYBILL_NO = #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRICING_CRI_DETAIL_ID = #{pricingCriDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ACTIVE = #{active,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BILL_TIME = #{billTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CURRENCY_CODE = #{currencyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT /*模块：接送货-运单-根据运单号查询开单在“其它费用”表格中显示的费用信息*/ P.PRICING_CRI_DETAIL_ID AS ID, E.CODE,P.AMOUNT/100 as FEE,C.CACULATE_TYPE,C.DESCRIPTION,C.MAX_FEE/100 as MAX_FEE, E.NAME,C.MIN_FEE/100 as MIN_FEE,C.CANMODIFY,C.CANDELETE FROM PKP.T_SRV_PRICING_CRITERIA_DETAIL C, PKP.T_SRV_WAYBILL_CH_DETAIL_PG P, PKP.T_SRV_PRICING_ENTRY E
P.PRICING_CRI_DETAIL_ID = C.ID(+) AND E.CODE = P.PRICING_ENTRY_CODE AND P.ACTIVE = #{active,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND P.WAYBILL_NO = #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND E.CODE IN ( SELECT CODE FROM PKP.T_SRV_PRICING_ENTRY START WITH CODE IN (#{type1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) CONNECT BY REF_ID = PRIOR ID)
